page.title: 09GAMES IN 1985
page.content: One game we play is called"Time Bomb". Everyone has to stand in a circle and the person who starts needs a ball. They throw a ball to someone and if that person drops the ball they must run round all the players before they count down from ten to one. If they don' make it back in time they have to take their turn in the middle of the circle. Aother game we play is "Piggy in the Middle". Someone stands in the middle with two people on either side of him or her. The ones on the outside throw a ball to each other and the middle one has to try to get it. If he gets it he changes places with the person who threw it. "Two ball" is where you get two balls and juggle with them until you drop one.
